channel.title: MonsterPK 667/718!
channel.description:
[size=4]Currently[/size]:[size=5]online[/size] Forums: [url=http://monsterpkp.webs.com/]http://monsterpkp.webs.com/[/url] Downloadable Client: [url=http://monsterpkp.webs.com/webclient]http://monsterpkp.webs.com/webclient[/url]
This server is only recent, however MonsterPk has gone before and was very successful! There are updates everyday creating new and better things for the players.
[u]Current Features:[/u] -Nex -God wars Dungeon -Dungeoneering -Daily events!(hosted by the owner himself) -Daily Updates(based on what players want,within reason) -Custom Items! -Loads more come online to see!!!
[u]Currently being fixed or have been fixed(lots of things not working but most have been fixed)[/u] -G.E Dupes(fixed) -Castle wars/clan wars etc(half fixed few simple things to add)

item.title: MonsterPK 667/718!
item.dc:creator: @mattfleckney mattfleckney
item.description:
@mattfleckney wrote:

aha love how he said go for it but I doubt it will be put into our server, in my opinion its a stupid suggestion.

Sorry if you felt offended I wasn’t intending for that.

Still you should play its a decent server

Read full topic

item.title: MonsterPK 667/718!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“mattfleckney, post:3, topic:521502”]First of all we listen to PLAYERS (incase your wondering thats people who actually play), as it says above.

Secondly within reason, E.G. no stupid suggestions.

Thank you.[/quote]who said it’s a stupid suggestion?

It would be a unique skill. Just to prove my point read this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Highly insulted >.<

Read full topic
